long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blocks 99.99% of ads and pop-ups on YouTube and all your favorite websites.

Features:
-Blocks ads, pop ups, banner ads and video ads.
-Block third-party trackers and helps protect your privacy.
-Browse safely by blocking malicious ads with malware, scams, and cryptocurrency miners.
-Improve page load times and enjoy a faster, safer and overall cleaner Internet.
